definition: country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)

sentences.english: First of all, I sing a song for country songs.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我为大家唱一首乡村歌曲。

sentences.english: The building consists of two parts as visitor center and rural guest houses.
sentences.chinese: 该建筑分为游客中心和乡村客舍两部分。

sentences.english: During my childhood days, house doors could be left ajar at night.
sentences.chinese: 儿时的乡村，是可以夜不闭户的。

sentences.english: Nothing can describe the peace that surrounded the country parsonage.
sentences.chinese: 乡村的牧师住宅，四周静谧得难以名状。

sentences.english: Below gave everyone a good feeling villages light rock song.
sentences.chinese: 下面送给大家一首好听的乡村轻摇滚感觉的歌。

sentences.english: The paper concludes with some suggestions for the development of China' s rural planning laws and regulations.
sentences.chinese: 文尾提出对我国乡村规划法规建设的一些建议。

sentences.english: I had a great curiosity to see a Bengal village.
sentences.chinese: 我怀着极大的好奇心，想去看孟加拉的乡村。

sentences.english: This is an age-old approach, recommended by many country grandmothers.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种古老的方法，由许多乡村老奶奶推荐。

sentences.english: A comprehensive country club is built as entertainment facility.
sentences.chinese: 文化娱乐建有综合性乡村俱乐部。

sentences.english: And we shouldn't forget to develop the country-side.
sentences.chinese: 当然我们也不应该忘记发展乡村。

sentences.english: The little country schoolhouse was heated by an old-fashioned , pot - bellied stove.
sentences.chinese: 那所小小的乡村小学依靠一个旧式的圆肚火炉取暖。

sentences.english: Efacropoliss to build a new left-wing countryancillary will accomplish cogent advance.
sentences.chinese: 社会主义新乡村建设获得重大进展。

sentences.english: He once was employed as a country school-teacher.
She became known as Mother Maybelle, the mother of American country music.
sentences.chinese: 她被称为母亲梅贝尔，美国乡村音乐的母亲。

sentences.english: The rural country needs to form authority and decide the rights of developments dependently.
sentences.chinese: 乡村社会要形成权威，自主决定乡村教育的发展权。

sentences.english: The rural country needs to form authority and decide the rights of developments dependently.
sentences.chinese: 乡村社会要形成权威，自主决定乡村教育的发展权。

definition: native soil/one's native land/one's hometown/local (to an area)
